alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko; Marshall; Noble; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:49PM EDT until August 29 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Noble County in northeastern Indiana... Northwestern Whitley County in northeastern Indiana... Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... Southeastern Marshall County in north central Indiana... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nappanee to near Argos, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Nappanee, Winona Lake, Syracuse, Milford, North Webster, Pierceton, Mentone, Etna Green, Leesburg, Cromwell, Big Barbee Lake, Ridinger Lake, Monoquet, Hoffman Lake, Atwood, Irish Lake, Lake Wawasee, Gravelton and Little Chapman Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
